original_text: Remember this: If a farmer plants only a few seeds, he will not get much as a result. But if he plants plenty of seeds, he will get a big harvest.
korean_text: 이것이 곧 적게 심는 자는 적게 거두고 많이 심는 자는 많이 거둔다 하는 말이로다

sentences.original_text: If a farmer plants only a few seeds,
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 농부가 단 몇 개의 씨앗만 심는다면,

sentences.original_text: he will not get much as a result.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 결과로 많은 것을 얻지 못할 것이다.

sentences.original_text: But if he plants plenty of seeds,
he will get a big harvest.
